mapper.select: select * from askrecord order by time desc
select * from askrecord order by time desc limit #{offset},#{limit}
select * from askrecord where issuccess=#{issuccess} order by time asc
select * from askrecord where time > #{time} order by issuccess asc
mapper.insert: insert ignore askrecord task (id, phone, type, time,functions,issuccess,errormsg) values (#{id}, #{phone}, #{type}, #{time},#{functions},#{issuccess},#{errormsg})
mapper.update: update askrecord set phone=#{phone}, type=#{type}, time=#{time}, functions=#{functions}, issuccess=#{issuccess}, errormsg=#{errormsg} where id=#{id}
